No. 74427 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JUNE 12, 2018

The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, f/k/a the Bank of New York as Trustee for the Certificateholders of CWALT, Inc., Alternative Loan Trust 2005-41 Mortgage Pass-Through Certificates, Series 2005-41; and Recontrust Company, N.A., Appellant,
v.
NEVADA SANDCASTLES, LLC, Respondent.

Dismissed.
